last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: A sad development stokes public frenzy. While Shobha can't shake a gut feeling on Anamika's whereabouts, someone else knows more than they let on.

name: The Fame Game
overview: When India's most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When India’s most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Anamika’s sudden disappearance launches an investigation. Flashes of the preceding weeks reveal her strained marriage and a troubling incident at home.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As public concern for Anamika grows, Avi suspects Nikhil while Shobha distrusts Manish. Amara recalls Anamika’s concern over her acting aspirations.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Shobha questions Nikhil’s film financier. In flashbacks, truths emerge about Anamika’s wealth and Manish’s diagnosis. Anamika wonders what Avi is hiding.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Earlier weeks reveal Anamika's growing defiance and an altercation that leaves Avi distraught. In the present, Billy begins his own search for Anamika.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shobha’s alarming discovery spawns more arguments within the family. In the past, pressure pushes Amara near a breaking point and Anamika faces danger.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A visit to Manish’s farmhouse gives Anamika clarity. In the present day, amid news of a murder, a music launch for Anamika and Manish’s film turns tense.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The police team rushes to track down the site of an alarming clue. Shobha urges Avi to tell her what he knows — and he lets damning family secrets spill.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A sad development stokes public frenzy. While Shobha can't shake a gut feeling on Anamika's whereabouts, someone else knows more than they let on.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: When India’s most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.
